contents: Article 5 (Organization) ① Sports organizations of special cities, metropolitan cities, special autonomous cities, provinces, and provinces (hereinafter referred to as *city/provincial sports organizations) shall be approved by the general meeting of delegates of member sports organizations (hereinafter referred to as *general meeting). You can sign up as a member. Revised 2017. 8. 7., 2021. 10. 6. ② City/provincial sports organizations become members of the member city/provincial sports association of the Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *City/Provincial Sports Council) after going through the procedures in accordance with paragraph 1. You must sign up with . Revised on October 6, 2021. ③ Member sports organizations may, through resolution at the general meeting, establish a national federation to carry out the purpose of Article 4. Revised on August 7, 2017. ④ Article 10 of the Sports Association Articles of Incorporation shall apply mutatis mutandis to the rights and obligations of city/provincial sports organizations and national federations with respect to member sports organizations. ⑤ Member sports organizations may recognize overseas Korean sports organizations, and necessary matters regarding recognition, operation, rights and obligations, etc. shall be determined separately.
